contents:
a * (b + c)
= (a * b) + (a * c)                        [distributivity]
= (a * (c + d)) + (a * c)                  [b=c+d]
= (a * c) + (a * d) + (a * c)              [distributivity]
= (a * c) + (a * c) + (a * d)              [commutativity*]
